content.description:
Columbia’s Easter Bonnet

Courtesy of the Library of Congress
content.question: The ideas addressed in the image most directly relate to

choices.label: opposition to the United States collective security arrangement with Western Europe
the fear of increased militarism among European and Pacific powers
the increased visibility of women’s organizations that criticized imperialism
debates about United States acquisition of overseas territories

content.answer: debates about United States acquisition of overseas territories

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
